answers.answer: Stress causes adrenalin to be produced, and when adrenalin is high, glucose levels rise. So this could be the explanation. The a1c test will be the best test for how well your pancreas is doing its job, for it shows the AVERAGE glucose levels from the past 3 months rather than one isolated glucose level at a specific time. That will show for sure how well your body is maintaining its glucose.While 204 is abnormally high, it may be a result of the sugary drink or stress or both. However, may I make a recommendation that if your body truly doesn't respond well to sugary drinks, you may want to make some changes in your diet? Avoiding high-glycemic index foods and drinks is just healthy for all people, but especially for people whose glucose levels show that their bodies aren't responding quickly to them.

question: I have had some symptoms which could be diabetes. I am not diagnosed yet. A month ago I had a fasting blood glucose and it was 92.  I went to Dr. and they did a finger stick yesterday, half an hour after I had drank a bottle of Ensure energy drink.  The result was 204, which is high.I took an A1C blood test today.   Could the 204 half an hour after eating a sugary drink mean I have diabetes?  What kind of tests are used to diagnose diabetes for sure.I am under an extreme amout of stress, and on hour before finger stick I found out about serious illness my 15 year old has, so stress was very present.Thanks for any help you can give
title: Glucose Level half hour after drinking enxure
